nodes.text: The Legend of Lehon was a legend which suggested that the Outer Rim desert planet of Tatooine was once covered by lush jungle and inhabited by the Kumumgah. At some point, a B'omarr monk told the legend to a prisoner at Jabba's Palace and added that little evidence had been found for the Kumumgah's existence. The legend also shared its name with the planet Lehon.

The Legend of Lehon was first mentioned in the audiobook Choose Your Destiny: An Escape Mission, written by Cavan Scott and released in 2019. The canon reference book Ultimate Star Wars had previously confirmed that the canon version of Tatooine was once a lush planet covered in oceans and rainforests, but had somehow become a desert.

In the Legends video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic it is revealed that Tatooine was once an arboreal world, covered in dense forests and oceans. After being conquered by the warlike Rakata of Lehon it was reduced to a barren, arid wasteland when the Rakata used their Force-infused technology to terraform the world, stripping it of its natural resources to fuel their Infinite Empire.
